definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: shearing, mowing (As. gizzu Zehnpfund:BAS i. 530, Aram. [[גִּיזׇּא]] gezo0 fleece )—[[גֵּז]] Ps 72:6, also cstr. De 18:4, Job 31:20; pl. cstr. [[גִּזֵּי]] Am 7:1; —shearing = thing sheared off, wool, fleece [[חאׁן]] ´[[ג]] De 18:4, [[כְּבָשַׂי]] ´[[ג]] Job 31:20; mowing Am 7:1 ([[הַמֶּלֶךְ]] ´[[ג]] cf. RS:Sem. i. 228); = land to be mown Ps 72:6 (but shearing in both, acc. to Hoffm:ZAW 1883, 116 ff. SS).
